title: Erythromycin-metal complexes: One-step synthesis, molecular docking analysis and antibacterial proficiency against pathogenic strains
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Samuel Attah Egu, Lian Ojotule Abah, Jumai Zainab Hussaini, Alexander David Onoja, Irfan Ali, Atiya Habib, Urooj Qureshi, Sunday Okpanachi Idih, Emmanuel Edegbo, Lawrence Achimugu, Aminu Omale, Ojochide Charity Michael, Mohammed Umar Adaji, Jamila Audu Omale
